meanings.definition: (ラテン語)逃れる、脱する、避ける

examples.translation: 敵は逃れようと試みた。

verb_forms.present_active: effugiō, effugis, effugit, effugimus, effugitis, effugiunt
verb_forms.past_active: effugiēbam, effugiēbās, effugiēbat, effugiēbāmus, effugiēbātis, effugiēbant
verb_forms.future_active: effugiam, effugies, effugiet, effugiemus, effugietis, effugient
verb_forms.perfect_active: effūgī, effūgistī, effūgit, effūgimus, effūgistis, effūgērunt
verb_forms.pluperfect_active: effūgeram, effūgerās, effūgerat, effūgerāmus, effūgerātis, effūgerant
verb_forms.future_perfect_active: effūgerō, effūgeris, effūgerit, effūgerimus, effūgeritis, effūgerint
verb_forms.present_passive: effugior, effugeris, effugitur, effugimur, effugimini, effugiuntur
verb_forms.past_passive: effugiebar, effugiebaris, effugiebatur, effugiebamur, effugiebamini, effugiebantur
verb_forms.future_passive: effugiar, effugieris, effugietur, effugiemur, effugiemini, effugientur
verb_forms.perfect_passive: effugitus sum, effugitus es, effugitus est, effugiti sumus, effugiti estis, effugiti sunt
verb_forms.pluperfect_passive: effugitus eram, effugitus eras, effugitus erat, effugiti eramus, effugiti eratis, effugiti erant
verb_forms.future_perfect_passive: effugitus ero, effugitus eris, effugitus erit, effugiti erimus, effugiti eritis, effugiti erunt

usage_notes.explanation: ラテン語の動詞であり、主に文章や文学作品で使用されます。
